title: Academic Writing for Graduate Students
description: Introduces best practices in academic writing including issues of citation, plagiarism, and structure in research. Students receive feedback from instructors and peers in order to encourage a "writing process" and an awareness of student/faculty roles.

pre_req_data.text: Concurrent enrollment in GRAD 200 and GRAD 202 is required. Enrollment is restricted to international graduate students in the Graduate Preparation Program.
